section:
GUI/Screens Directory Reference GUI/Screens Directory Reference Directory dependency graph for Screens:
Files
file about_screen.c
Source that displays about screen.
file about_standard_valve_screen.c
Source that displays standard valves details screens.
file clear_screen.c
Source that displays clear message screen.
file common_screen_calls.c
Source that has common function related to screen, label creations.
file config_screen.c
Source that displays configuration (sub-menu) (ip_address_configuration) screen.
file diag_valve_about_screen.c
Source that displays the diagnostic valves about screen.
file error_screen.c
Source that displays error screen when there is an error.
file ext_propzone_about_screen.c
Source that displays the external pressure zone (i.e external prop valve) about screen.
file io_modules_about_screen.c
Source that displays IO_modules about screen.
file mac_screen.c
Source that displays MAC screen details.
file menu_screen.c
Source that displays menu screen.
file module_screen.c
Source that displays module screen.
file pin_screen.c
Source that displays pin screen.
file pressure_zone_about_screen.c
Source that displays pressure zone's number screens.
file pz_details_about_screen.c
Source that displays pressure zone's details screens.
file qr_screen.c
Source that displays QR screen.
file status_screen.c
Source that displays status screen.
